analysis.key_quote: I view this proposal as an existential threat to the merit-based foundations of the civil service and a dangerous politicization of roles that are — by law and by design — nonpartisan and professional in nature.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, highlighting concerns about the erosion of merit-based hiring and the potential for politicization of the civil service, which aligns with the themes of merit-based system concerns and politicization.
